job.title: Systems Software Engineer
job.description: The team is looking for a skilled and motivated engineer that wants to be part of a team that will drive the development of all new Home and Audio products. The ideal candidate would be a skilled SW generalist with a great investigative attitude and strong sense of curiosity. Previous experience in working on large scale projects is a great plus as well as having a full understanding of the overall system. In addition, experience on product lifecycle from conception through shipping is required. Specifically, his/her responsibilities will span from writing and debugging SW specific to a product (communication services, drivers, UI etc) to efficiently integrate general platform services provided by other teams. You will have more than 7+ years hands on experience on integration of medium/large projects based on a full OS: Linux, Android, or BSD.   You will be proficient in C and C++ with both kernel and user space programming.   Strong experience in debugging complex systems fundamental.   Experience in large scale production support is a plus. Ability to easily and quickly move between different areas is a big plus.   Experience working on cross functional projects between Engineering, QA, operations would be a huge plus.   May require some travel to china for factory support. This is a highly technical role. The Product Development will directly maintain a number of product specific services such as UI, Power management tuning, system control and drivers but the team is fundamentally responsible for the overall SW running on a product and the successful integration of the full device. This team will work with a large number of Engineering teams (HW and SW) and QA to analyze global failures and act as first responders as well as own the full lifecycle of a product. BS/CS/EE/CE or relevant work experience    Role Number: 200248125
